name: Where is my Flag
description:
This game was made on GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the theme Only One.  For the best experience you have to download it and play it on Windows.

Otherwise you can also try it here: GAME.

In the game you have only one flag and a bunch of aliens to ...

Your objective is to clear all the check points and avoiding to touch the aliens, you can also throw the flag, but then you have to go and collect it in order to throw it again or to clear the checkpoint.

It's a TPS game with national Slovenian symbols and elements.
